featured.text: For thousands of years, the Chinese have valued highly the soybean, considering it one of the five important grains (along with rice, millet, barley, and wheat).

definition.zh_def: 一種小穀物，通常用於食品和飼料，富含營養。
definition.en_def: A type of small grain often used for food and animal feed, rich in nutrients.
definition.example: She made a delicious porridge using millet for breakfast.
